concept.title: Generating link previews on chat
concept.shortdesc: By default, Sametime automatically generates link previews for messages containing links to websites. Edit this policy to fit your business needs.

title.parmname: Policy id = im.urlPreviewEnabled, Default Setting: ON

section.p: By default, Sametime establishes a connection with the website to query the metadata and generate link previews on the chat. Turn this policy off to disable this feature.
